data.contentText: Manage this baby according to the weight as below

metadata.text1: These babies are usually strong enough to feed normally on the breast after birth
metadata.text2:
May require cup feeds

Skin-skin & kangaroo care for thermoregulation

If the baby is feeding well with assistance, warm and not exhibiting any danger signs, the baby can stay their with mother

If the baby is not feeding well by breast, bottle, or cup or exhibiting any danger signs the baby should stay in special care nursery
metadata.text3: Needs admission to special care nursery for close observation

data.title: MANAGEMENT
